headline: McKesson (MCK) Is Up 8.9% After Raising Profit Forecast and Outlining Growth Priorities – Has the Bull Case Changed?
summary: McKesson announced a raised profit forecast and updated long-term growth targets during its 2025 Investor Day, highlighting an increased earnings outlook and a focus on high-margin businesses such as oncology and multispecialty services. The company also introduced organizational changes designed to accelerate growth and enhance transparency, underscoring management’s confidence in key segments like cancer medicines and biopharma as future drivers of performance. We'll review how McKesson’s...
